context: Is this the ps vita or ps vita slim? Just making sure!:)
response: The original. Couple ways to tell the difference is looking at the product description. If it says "OLED" (original) vs "LCD" (Slim). And in the picture the speakers. Original is has the speaker holes in a rectangular form while Slim has the holes in a circular form.
